Name: Report a treasure find
Sub-services:
A. Report to Coroner's office > Contact Liaison Officers (email)

B. Report to Coroner's office > Contact Liaison Officers (phone)

Name: Upload a local activity

A. Go to website > Register (online) > Login > Add an activity (online)

B. Go to website > Login > Add an activity (online)

Sub-services: Go to website > Submit an event (online) > Receive decision for submission (email?)

Name: Find a youth work placement
Sub-services: Email > Be contacted (email/phone)

Name: Refer a male youth to the Good Man mentoring programme
Sub-services: A. Fill in form (online) > Get contacted (email/phone)

Name: Report a flood
Sub-services:
A. Fill in a form (online) > Get notification of submission > Get response if possible or update about next steps > eg site visit >  Be updated about status/actions > receive final update about report

B. Report by email > Get notification about repot with SLA > Get response if possible or update about next steps > Receive final update about report

- Might email (most common) to get updates if haven't heard yet

Name: Report something
Sub-services:
A. Get directed to the right authority > Report to Highways authority > Report something > Select from options > Check if Highway authority is already aware of it > Get an issue reference number

B. Get directed to the right authority > Report to Highways authority > Report something > Select from options > Check if Highways Authority is already aware of it > Upload a picture and fill in a form > Get a reference number

C. Get directed to the right authority > Report to Highways authority > Report something > Select from options > if it is about Traffic Lights not working/out of sync OR flooding OR tree in the middle of the street (if severe and urgent conditions) > Call
